title: approach BlockJoinSelector.warp(...DISI children) in sort=childfield(..)
description: the great idea was provided: .. we should make (BitSet for the children) a DocIdSetIterator, which would have the nice side-effect that we could easily combine the doc values iterator and the child filter using a ConjunctionDISI to efficiently only iterate over child doc ids that both have a value and match the child filter, but the first scratch scared me much.
